account_deletion_description: We understand that you may wish to delete your account immediately. By proceeding, all your personal data and account information will be permanently erased from our system. Please read the important information below before proceeding with instant account deletion.
what_happens_when_you_delete_your_accoun: What Happens When You Delete Your Account?
account_deletion_point_1: • All your personal data, including your profile, email, and any saved settings or preferences, will be permanently deleted.
account_deletion_point_2: • All activity history, messages, and any interactions related to your account will also be erased.
account_deletion_point_3: • This action is immediate and irreversible. Once deleted, your account cannot be restored.
instant_deletion_process_point_1: • Click the “Delete My Account” button below to permanently delete your account immediately.
instant_deletion_process_point_2: • Once clicked, your account and all associated data will be wiped from our database.
can_i_recover_my_account_after_deletion: Can I Recover My Account After Deletion?
account_recovery_info: • No, once your account is deleted, there is no way to recover it. Please make sure to back up any important data or information before proceeding.
consideration_point_1: • Make sure you are absolutely certain about deleting your account. There will be no second chance after the process is completed.
consideration_point_2: • If you have any concerns or require assistance, please reach out to us at gustavo@summumconsulting.com before proceeding.
apple_policy: Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You can manage or cancel your subscription in your App Store account settings.
